name: A Normal Pong Game
description:
An arcade game with a twist, made by dorks, for the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.2!

A playlist of the full dev streams can be found on YouTube, here!

The game is only playable on Windows at this time.

There is a Portable version which doesn't require an install, simply download > unzip > play!

There is also an installer if you prefer that route, it can be uninstalled per usual after playing.
